entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wunnummin Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:17 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 1:39 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 1:39 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
